title: Emergency Provision of Demining Equipment to the State Emergency Service of Ukraine
description: This project provides critically required demining equipment and related personal protective equipment to the State Emergency Service of Ukraine (SESU) as part of Canada's support to Ukraine in the face of Russia's unprovoked and illegal invasion. Project activities include: : (1) supplying twelve heavy-lift transport vehicles for use by SESU’s demining and explosive ordnance disposal teams; and (2) and supplying twenty medium-lift transport vehicles for use by SESU’s demining and explosive ordnance disposal teams.
